sentence: Using a closure is the simplest solution for simple cases
tag_sequence: O O O O O O O O O O

sentence: Using a delegate is common when there is complex communication between two objects .
tag_sequence: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

sentence: One delegate can be better than many closures .
tag_sequence: O O O O O O O O O

sentence: You have to use notifications when you have multiple observers or when you are not sure what objects will be observing .
tag_sequence: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

sentence: You might be asking yourself why we are using closures for simple cases and not delegates or notifications .
tag_sequence: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

sentence: The answer is that closures are the most lightweight .
tag_sequence: O O O O O O O O O O

sentence: They are easy to create and they positively affect your code quality .
tag_sequence: O O O O O O O O O O O O O

sentence: Let 's consider a completion callback .
tag_sequence: O O O O O O O

sentence: If you decide to use a notification , you need another method that will handle that notification .
tag_sequence: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

sentence: The same is valid for delegates .
tag_sequence: O O O O O O O

sentence: If you need some context ( e.g . the parameters that triggered the actions ) , you will need to save it into a property .
tag_sequence: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

sentence: On the other hand , a closure can be created inline .
tag_sequence: O O O O O O O O O O O O

sentence: That means that the code that triggers the action and handles its result is at one place .
tag_sequence: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

sentence: This really simplifies the structure of your code .
tag_sequence: O O O O O O O O O

sentence: Also note that if the closure needs some context , it can capture it , without the need to create an additional property .

sentence: It 's dangerously unsafe ( undefined behavior ) to return a pointer to a stack variable .

sentence: That includes arrays allocated on the stack .

sentence: The memory occupied by a stack variable is essentially deallocated as soon as the function returns .

sentence: By making the array allocation static , it 's allocation will persist and is safer .. .
